page.title: 01A GAZETTEER OF REDBOURN.
page.content: {Redbourn }is a village of 5,500 people situated in the middle of a triangle of the towns of {Harpenden, {Hemel Hempstead }and {St. Albans.}The High Street which runs through the village is part the {Old Roman Road } called {Watling Street. } The M1 motorway runs North to South about half a mile to the West of the village. In November 1984 a {By_Pass }was opened which runs round the edge of the village. {Redbourn}is well known for its large Common.It is used for fairs,fetes and cricket.And at the bottom of the common there is a stream called the Ver. There is one Infant school and one Junior school in the village. {Brook Bond,OXO}have a large factory here which employs many villagers.
